name: mist
effect: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
short_effect: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates a mist that stops reduction of abilities.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The ally party is protected by a mist that prevents stat reductions.
